name: Yallaiah Onteru
title: Java Developer
professional_summary: Utilized Core Java and Spring Boot to develop scalable backend applications, ensuring high performance and reliability in an agile environment.
Engineered microservices architectures using Spring Boot, enhancing system modularity and scalability for complex applications.
Implemented REST APIs with Spring Boot, facilitating seamless communication between frontend and backend systems.
Integrated Hibernate/JPA for efficient ORM, streamlining database interactions and improving data access performance.
Optimized SQL queries to enhance database performance, ensuring faster response times for critical applications.
Implemented CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins and GitHub Actions, automating testing and deployment processes for faster releases.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to design and deploy microservices, improving system resilience and maintainability.
Applied Java 8+ features like streams and lambdas to write cleaner, more efficient code, reducing development time.
Developed and maintained RESTful APIs, ensuring compliance with industry standards and best practices for API design.
Worked with Docker and Kubernetes to containerize applications, enabling consistent deployment across environments.
Integrated Kafka for real-time data streaming, enhancing data processing capabilities in high-throughput systems.
Implemented cloud-native solutions on AWS, leveraging services like EC2 and RDS for scalable and secure applications.
Conducted code reviews and debugging sessions to identify and resolve performance bottlenecks in Java applications.
Participated in agile ceremonies, contributing to sprint planning, daily stand-ups, and retrospectives for continuous improvement.
Automated repetitive tasks using shell scripts, freeing up time for more complex problem-solving activities.
Mentored junior developers in Java best practices, fostering a culture of knowledge sharing and team growth.
Ensolved complex technical challenges through iterative problem-solving, learning from failures and adapting strategies.
Delivered high-quality software solutions on time, balancing multiple priorities in a fast-paced development environment.
